title: i didn't get a veteran emote?
body: were we supposed to get our veteran emotes yet? if so i wonder why i didn't get it? i remember checking a few years ago and having well over 2000 hours of league game time so i am 100% sure that i should have it... but i don't?

replies.body: We don't have an official means to show time played currently, so any third party site you use would be wildly inaccurate.  I looked into this for you, and do see you unlocked the Conqueror of the League emote.  You should find this in your Emote collections for equipping.
ah, thank you :D also i didn't use a site it was a program which if it was running would keep track of what games i have running and would just... record game time :P
